com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly
Class DefaultInterstitialDecorator

java.lang.Object
  com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.DefaultInterstitialDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
View.OnClickListener, BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IDecorator
public class DefaultInterstitialDecorator
extends Object
implements BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IDecorator, View.OnClickListener

Default decorator for interstitial view. It just shows X button in the upper lefthand corner.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii

decorate

public View decorate(View adView,
                     IOverlayContainer shownOverlay)
Description copied from interface: BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IDecorator
Decorate source view to allow arbitrary interstitial decoration. This view will not be opened as a new activity, instead it will be opened in an overlay view on the top of a view hierarchy, hence simultaing a fullscreen.

Specified by:
decorate in interface BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IDecorator
Parameters:
adView - View interstitial view to be shown
shownOverlay - IOverlayContainer shown overlay view
Returns:
View decorated view that holds source interstitial view
